document_data.name: Malise
document_data.mainbody: '''Malise''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Tiamat]] living in [[Unther]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Malise managed the [[Altar of Scales]] temple in [[Unthalass]]. He was busy crossbreeding [[dragon]]s with other creatures like [[outsider]]s. He had created a new kind of [[abishai]] and some new [[dragonspawn]].
document_data.History: Malise gained the collaboration of the young [[brown dragon]] [[blackguard]] [[Slavin'krath'magaal]], who'd agreed to mate with Malise to give birth to a [[half-dragon]] offspring, [[Braeden]].
document_data.Personality: Malise dreamed of using his hybrid to gain power in Unther and overthrow [[Tiglath]] as high priest of Tiamat.
